title: Cinnamon drizzle cake
ingredients: ['150g golden caster sugar', '150g slightly salted butter, softened', '3 medium eggs', '1/2 to 1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon (for cake)', '25g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon (for icing)', 'Small amount of water for icing']
